CustomField.formula: IMAGE(IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Plan_Review_Complete__c)),"/img/samples/light_green.gif", IF(OR( Safe_Harbor_Review__c = true, Auto_Enrollment_Review__c = true, Auto_Allocation_Review__c = true,NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Forfeiture_Method_Review__c))),Participation_Review__c = true,Contributions__c=true, Profit_Sharing_Allocation_Method__c =true, Involuntary_Distribution_Review__c =true,NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Changes_Made__c)))),"/img/samples/light_yellow.gif","/img/samples/light_red.gif")) ,"status color")
CustomField.label: Plan Review Status
